text.section: This section applies only to applications affecting land encumbered by a deed of easement created under this subtitle.

If the Foundation has not authorized approval of the application, a county may deny an application for:
A subdivision plat or plan;
A building permit, except for:
Improvements or accessories to an existing residence; or
A farm building or structure;
A nonagricultural conditional use or special exception; or
Any other nonagricultural use or activity.
